instruction: Summarize the negative impact of power outages on firms, households, and the economy.
output: Power outages have a well-documented negative impact on firms, households, and the economy. For firms, power outages can lead to interruption of production and daily life, as well as the need for expensive back-up equipment, which can lock scarce capital into unproductive means. For households, power outages can lead to inconvenience and discomfort, as well as potential health risks. For the economy as a whole, power outages can lead to lost productivity and economic losses. This negative impact has been documented in all parts of the world and at all levels of development.
